The Big Freeze - Can you collect enough snowflakes to unlock Ice Bolt Tom?
Blaze Of Glory - Fire Arrow Angela can be yours. Just keep collecting flames!

BE A HERO, GET THE HERO PASS!
Hero Pass gives you bigger, better, and cooler rewards. In addition to the usual rewards you will:
- multiply your score
- discover heroic prizes
Hero Pass is only available through In-App Purchase.

Speed up and catch the Speed of Sound! Collect Music Note tokens to get an epic reward: an all-new Rockstar Ginger outfit!

NEW WORLD, NEW EVENT, NEW TOM!

Run through a wild and crazy new world.
Play the Temple Swing event, collect relics, and win rewards.
Unlock a brand new hero: Gold Flash Tom!

SPLASHTASTIC FUN
Jump mountains, swing on vines and traverse ravines as you run through the jungle! AND play the splash-tacular Color Blast event to collect tokens, win vibrant rewards and unlock Mighty Ginger.
